amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the "primary" designation as one of the ambient air quality standards for ozone subject to the limitation in section 438.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to remove the "primary" designation as one of the ambient air quality standards for ozone subject to the limitation in section 438.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A044) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
